attributes.action: Issue "EU Leave Article. 50" decision ONLY AFTER sufficient Parliament Scrutiny.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament (PLM) should decide how, when, Article 50 issued. GOV act on its advice ONLY.  Confidence motion / agreement on GOVs Idea by Parliament. 
- PLM allowed time under law (1yr min. 3 yr max - suggested) to decide how we go about leaving / how act on advice of referendum and contents of "divorce settlement".
- Only when PLMs confident does UK enact Art. 50 of EU
- Examples of PLMs considerations: Scotts' & N.Éires' vote. Economy, Security, Elmo?
Thus ensures stability of UK post EU leave!
attributes.background: I don't believe decision to leave was a good. Regardless. The advisory democratic voice has been heard and thus forward: Parliament as WHOLE decide for when/how Article 50 handled (Leaving after 2yr bit): "Motion of Confidence in enacting Article 50 of EU by HM GOV.". Thus GOOD "Divorce Settlement"
